alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Suffolk County through 645 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rocky Point, or near Wading River, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Riverhead, Manorville, Wading River, Center Moriches, Westhampton, Rocky Point, Calverton, Shinnecock Hills, Brookhaven National Laboratory, Hampton Bays, Ridge, Miller Place, Sound Beach, East Moriches and East Quogue. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk
